product_name: Millet Montets Matrix Wind Jacket - Men's
long_description: Windproof in front, breathable in back, the men's Montets Matrix Wind Jacket from Millet is a great choice when you're moving fast and light on peaks or rock. Hybrid construction uses windproof Elements Shield(TM) Matrix as the main body fabric, with side and back panels of breathable XCS 100 stretch fabric. Lightweight jacket is water-repellent, but not waterproof. Full-front zipper is bordered by high-visibility reflective piping. Thumbholes in cuffs are stretchy for comfort and extend coverage over the hands for added warmth. High collar protects the neck from chilly winds. Cuffs and hem have elastic binding that delivers a snug yet comfortable fit. 2 extra-roomy zippered hand pockets are accessible while wearing a pack. Millet Montets Matrix Wind Jacket for men features a trim alpine fit.
short_description: Windproof in front, breathable in back, the men's Montets Matrix Wind Jacket from Millet is a great choice when you're moving fast and light on peaks or rock.
